apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this heartwarming emoji portrays a couple composed of two women, one with a medium-light skin tone, united by a prominent heart rendered with Apple's distinctive glossy 3D shading.  The gentle curves and soft highlights on their figures, illuminated by realistic lighting, convey deep affection and companionship.  This emoji beautifully symbolizes love, commitment, and the celebration of relationships between women, offering a warm and inclusive expression on Apple devices.
